resources.string: You need to install the Shizuku app from the PlayStore and start it using ADB.
This mod allows you to replace Material You colors with the color of your choice.
This mod allows you to change the background color of the notification and app drawers and the text color of active qs tiles. Light Mode.
This mod allows you to change the background color of the notification and app drawers and the text color of active qs tiles. Dark Mode.
This mod allows you to change the text color of the home screen clock and weather.
This mod allows you to remove the gesture navigation pill. Do not use if you have button navigation.
This mod allows you to remove the navigation bar. Do not use if you have button navigation.
Remove the status bar battery icon. You can show the battery percentage by toggling the option in device Settings.
This mod allows you to remove the status bar icons. This leaves the clock and battery icons.
This mod allows you to remove the status bar clock.

"Your mods will stick after reboot, apart from the Color ones which are superseded by Material You. If you want your Color settings to stick, you need to disable Material You by toggling the Monet button below. A reboot is required afterwards."
To use this app, please install and start the Shizuku app from the Playstore first.
Credits:\nRikkaW for Shizuku\nZacharee for the FabricateOverlay Library
